main: (void) compress2(0, 0, 0, 0, 1);  // compress2 was added in zlib version 1.0.8

head: #if __STDC_VERSION__ >= 199901L
// Compiler claims to support C99, trust it
#else
#  error __STDC_VERSION__ must be >= 199901L
#endif
#if __STDC_VERSION__ >= 201112L
// Compiler claims to support C11, trust it
#else
#  error __STDC_VERSION__ must be >= 201112L
#endif
#if __cplusplus > 201103L
// Compiler claims to support C++14, trust it
#else
#  error __cplusplus must be > 201103L (the value of C++11)
#endif
#if __cplusplus > 201402L
// Compiler claims to support C++17, trust it
#else
#  error __cplusplus must be > 201402L (the value for C++14)
#endif
#include <map>  // https://bugs.llvm.org//show_bug.cgi?id=33117
#include <variant>
#if __cplusplus > 201703L
// Compiler claims to support experimental C++2a, trust it
#else
#  error __cplusplus must be > 201703L (the value for C++17)
#endif
#if defined(__GNUC__)
__attribute((visibility("default")))
#elif defined(__SUNPRO_CC)
__global
#else
#  error GCC4+ or SunStudio 8+ are required to support ELF visibility
#endif
#if !(defined(__i386) || defined(__i386__) || defined(__x86_64) || defined(__x86_64__) || defined(__amd64))
#  error Symbolic function binding on this architecture may be broken, disabling it (see QTBUG-36129).
#endif

gc_binaries.label: support for split sections and linker garbage collection

tail: // extra include needed in QNX7 to define NULL for the alloca() macro

head: #ifdef __QNXNTO__
#  include <sys/neutrino.h>
#  if _NTO_VERSION < 700
#    error stack-protector not used (by default) before QNX 7.0.0.
#  endif
#endif

intelcet.label: Support for Intel Control-flow Enforcement Technology

android-style-assets.label: Android Style Assets
android-style-assets.comment: This belongs into gui, but the license check needs it here already.

debug_and_release.label: Compile libs in debug and release mode

force_debug_info.label: Add debug info in release mode

appstore-compliant.label: App store compliance
appstore-compliant.purpose: Disables code that is not allowed in platform app stores

simulator_and_device.label: Build for both simulator and device

sanitize_fuzzer_no_link.label: Fuzzer (instrumentation only)
purpose: Adds instrumentation for fuzzing to the binaries but links to the usual main function instead of a fuzzer's.

dbus-linked.label: Qt D-Bus directly linked to libdbus

msvc_mp.label: Use multiple processors when compiling with MSVC

static_runtime.label: Statically link the C/C++ runtime library

relocatable.label: Relocatable
relocatable.purpose: Enable the Qt installation to be relocated.

earlyReport.comment: This is not an actual report - instead, it activates the early setup.

earlyReport.message: You are not licensed to use this software.

-debug-and-release is only supported on Darwin and Windows platforms.
Qt can be built in release mode with separate debug information, so
-debug-and-release is no longer necessary.
debug-only framework builds are not supported. Configure with -no-framework if you want a pure debug build.
This platform does not support RPATH
Command line option -coverage is only supported with clang compilers.
Command line option -sanitize fuzzer-no-link is only supported with clang compilers.

report.message:
Using static linking will disable the use of dynamically
loaded plugins. Make sure to import all needed static plugins,
or compile needed modules into the library.

Qt is using double for qreal on this system. This is binary-incompatible against Qt 5.1.
Configure with '-qreal float' to create a build that is binary-compatible with 5.1.
Qt requires a compliant STL library.
Debug build wihtout Release build is not currently supported on ios see QTBUG-71990. Use -debug-and-release.

entries.args: avx512f avx512er avx512cd avx512pf avx512dq avx512bw avx512vl avx512ifma avx512vbmi
